definition: Buddhist hall
dhyana (Sanskrit)/Zen/meditation (Buddhism)
to abdicate
courtyard/institution/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Any yogis who wishes to stay in this hermitage must accept and comply to the following terms.
sentences.chinese: 任何修行者想在本禪院修行都必須遵守以下條規。

sentences.english: You may bank in directly to our bank account. Once you have banked in, please inform us.
sentences.chinese: 您可直接將捐款進入禪院戶口，並通知禪院負責人。

sentences.english: You may bank in directly to our bank account. Once you have banked in, please inform us.
sentences.chinese: 您可直接將捐款進入禪院戶口，並通知禪院負責人。

sentences.english: This Bamboo Sea has been extended to the Peak, a famous ancient Toll of the Temple Fazang.
sentences.chinese: 這個竹海一直延伸到山頂，著名古禪院法藏寺。

sentences.english: All chanyuan celestials should educate themselves in this aspect .
sentences.chinese: 所有禪院都應該在這方面教育自己。

sentences.english: You may bank in directly to our bank accounts. Once you have banked in, please inform us.
sentences.chinese: 您可直接將捐款進入禪院戶口，並通知禪院負責人。

sentences.english: You may bank in directly to our bank accounts. Once you have banked in, please inform us.
sentences.chinese: 您可直接將捐款進入禪院戶口，並通知禪院負責人。

sentences.english: They belonged to the Chan school of Buddhism, the basis of whose creed was abstract meditation.
sentences.chinese: 他們都屬於佛教禪院，其教義的實質是透徹覺悟。

sentences.english: This temple has a history of more than 500 years.
sentences.chinese: 禪院已經有了五百多年的歷史了。

sentences.english: All chanyuan celestials should educate themselves in this aspect.
sentences.chinese: 所有禪院都應該在這方面教育自己。

sentences.english: Jin Dading three years, the Emperor gave the hole as the Daming temple.
sentences.chinese: 金朝大定三年，皇帝賜封該洞爲大明禪院。

definition: Hall of Great Strength, main hall of a Buddhist temple containing the main image of veneration 大雄[da4 xiong2]
